documents.document: @peldroedGlantaf any info for weds please as I know you're out with rugby all day tomorrow. Thanks

Well done @peldroedGlantaf brilliant all round performance today in @CVSFA cup.

@peldroedGlantaf yr 9 another solid display from all lots of excellent play leading to good goals. Well done boys.x
Solid performance from @youth_county u14s v penybont fc u15 today. Did yourselves proud!!
2 weeks on the trot no fixture for @cianhales and @youth_county for @JnrPremFootball thankfully a friendly sunday instead

Well done @peldroedGlantaf yr 9 7-1 win over a very strong corpus. Good to see these boys back to winning ways!
Gutted we couldn't make the @Ysgol_Glantaf sports awards nights as no one to have avah especially as it turns out cian got an award!
@peldroedGlantaf do yr 9 have match Friday please?
@JnrPremFootball @cianhales @youth_county for once we'd left the sun in Wales!

@AGglantafPE no still in garage unfortunately lost without a car! It's ok he arranged with tirion. Thanks though

@cardiffcouncil great idea the lights on ely bridge!!!!!!!@
@peldroedGlantaf just to say a huge thank you to all staff. Sounds like the boys had a fantastic time. Thank you all so much.x

@peldroedGlantaf well done boys.x
@peldroedGlantaf good luck this evening boys.x
@peldroedGlantaf hope the journey hasn't been too bad and you've all managed some sleep. Please update us when you arrive. Enjoy.
@peldroedGlantaf that's @cianhales all packed and sorted. Have a great week all.x
@CVSFA presentation night, missing jac and rhod but we'll done @peldroedGlantaf @Ysgol_Glantaf boys https://t.co/dETpfZkMJw

@ElyRangersFC well done boys you've come on fantastic this season....
@FAWCoachEd another day of football for Cian before he heads off to Germany tomorrow with @youth_county
